title: Virtual CSA
job_overview:
We're Hiring: Virtual Customer Service Assistant (Full-Time, Remote) ????

Are you a dedicated, detail-loving, and proactive Virtual Assistant looking for a long-term role with a supportive, fast-paced team? Do you thrive under pressure, enjoy solving problems, and take pride in your communication and organizational skills?

If you bring a can-do attitude, love staying organized, and are ready to grow with a thriving business—we want to hear from you!

 What We’re Looking For:
? Excellent English Skills

Strong speaking, writing, listening, and reading abilities
American English accent preferred for client-facing communication
? Tech-Savvy & Resourceful

Proficient with Google Sheets, Google Docs, Google Photos, Canva
Comfortable using project management tools and picking up new systems quickly
? Communication Superstar

Clear, professional written and verbal communication is a must
Confident managing email, messages, and client interactions
? Detail-Oriented & Organized

You notice the small things and take a proactive approach to problem-solving
? Reliable & Accountable

You meet deadlines, own your responsibilities, and never leave things unfinished
? Adaptable & Growth-Minded

You welcome feedback, adapt to change, and love learning new skills
? Team-Oriented with Strong Work Ethic

You’re responsive, collaborative, and committed to your role
? Tech Requirements

High-speed internet
Reliable computer with camera and speaker
Must have camera on during shift hours
???? Availability

Must be available to work Monday–Friday, 8 AM–5 PM EST, and some Saturdays

???? Key Responsibilities:
Manage general office and admin tasks
Support project organization and scheduling
Assist with marketing, email communication, and writing/editing tasks
Create visual content and designs using Canva
Upload, organize, and manage content in Google platforms
Tackle day-to-day tasks with flexibility and a problem-solving mindset
???? Why You’ll Love Working With Us:
We’re a values-driven team that believes in mutual growth and success. When you thrive, we thrive—so we invest in your journey with us.

Perks & Benefits Include:

???? Two weeks of paid vacation
???? Quarterly performance bonuses
???? 13th-month pay (for consistently reliable teaUpgrade to see actual infombers)
???? Opportunities to grow and take on more responsibility over time

How to Apply: 
Email your application to Upgrade to see actual info with your answers (written or audio-recorded) to the following questions:

Have you ever been given multiple tasks at once? How did you manage them?
Share an example of a time you made a difficult decision.
What is your favorite hobby and why?
What’s your favorite childhood memory?
Share a link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile.
Tell us about yourself and your family in 5 sentences.
???? Important: Please indicate the position you are applying for in the subject line of your email (e.g., Virtual Customer Service Assistant Application).
???? This is a full-time position. If you're interested in part-time work, please let us know in your email.

If you're ready to join a team that values your input, rewards hard work, and truly supports your growth—we can’t wait to hear from you. Apply now and let’s build something amazing together!
